abstract: The sixth season premiere of ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” attracted 20.9 million viewers on Monday, easily leading the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Although ABC ranked first among the networks for the night, following the 90-minute dancing debut, the network’s premiere of “The Bachelor” drew a considerably smaller audience of 9 million viewers from 9:30 to 11 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The sixth season premiere of ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” attracted 20.9 million viewers on Monday, easily leading the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
